result.execSummary:
All charges against Joshua Daniel Seguin in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua Daniel Seguin is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua Daniel Seguin

records.addlTxt:
3:23 PM Prosecuting attorney Angela M Wilson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua Daniel Seguin in court. Court calls case. Defendant indicates he applied with the public defender's office and does not qualify. Would like to waive time limits for preliminary hearing and asks for a reset. State does not object. Court finds waiver is knowingly and voluntarily made.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Joshua Seguin appears in court.  Attorney Peter Kruger appears for the State of Wisconsin.Defendant's address updated and amended on complaint. Attorney/defendant acknowledges receipt of criminal complaint, waives reading. Court recites charges against defendant and possible penalties. Defendant advised of right to consult an attorney. Not guilty plea(s) entered. 
State requesting 500cb No contact with victim 1. 
Record in MN, reviews record. 2 fta, probation violations. Originally arrested on MN warrant
Defendant responds; doesn't know of any child support warrant, always pays child support.  Has no ability to post today.  Warrant was out of Chisago county for driving offense. Was failure to appear.
Court moved by the fact that defendant was rta'd yesterday to today and appeared.
Court orders 3000sb no contact with victim 1 as listed in ID key.
Set for STC atty check 6/20/22 3pm and Ph 6/22/22 845

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua Daniel Seguin
Current: 2309 Kelly Avenue, Cloquet, MN 55720 United States  (Effective: 06-08-2022)
Prior: 2309 Kelly Av., Cloquet, MN 55720

1:44 PM Defendant Joshua Daniel Seguin appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Angela M Wilson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Michael Hoffman special appearance.
Court indicates that she did not have time to review for probable cause because it was received so late.
State requests to have complaint reviewed for probable cause. Has MN warrants and requests to have initial appearance set for tomorrow.
Attorney objects to defendant being held on this case.
Court indicates that he is not being held on this case, hasn't set bail on this case.
initial appearance set for tomorrow.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
